# Kickstart your data Mesh MVP in a month

* A mesh is a graph consisting of nodes and edges

## Steps to start and deliver a data mesh MVP

* Prepare a System landscape diagram
* Stake holder mapping - Attitude, Power, Interest
* Choosing development teams
* Choosing a data governance team
* Setting up MVP Governance
* Developing minimal data products
    * Identifying domain-oriented datasets
    * Choose data product owners
    * Decide on the minimum viable data product description
    * Developing the simplest tools to expose your data
    * Setting up the minimal platform
    * Ensuring platform security
